articles.title: What Is Donald Trump Hiding?
articles.description: The latest revelations about President Trump’s past tax reports underscore the importance of examining his more recent returns.
articles.content: A tax return is far from a complete picture of a persons financial life. For one thing, it is an accounting of income rather than wealth, so it would not establish whether Mr. Trump is a billionaire. But Mr. Trumps tax returns could provide significant inform… [+2406 chars]
